value.li: "Just a test? *Just a test!?* Princess Celestia wants to give me some kind of exam, and you're trying to tell me to calm down because *it's just a test?!*" - Twilight Sparkle
"It needs to be about 20% cooler." - Rainbow Dash
"Eternal chaos come with chocolate rain, you guys! CHOCOLATE! RAIN!" - Pinkie Pie
"Of all the things that could have happened, this is the WORST. POSSIBLE. THING." - Rarity
"How do ya like them apples?" - Applejack
"The fun has been doubled!" - Princess Luna
"COME ON, SCHOOL OF MAGIC!" - Princess Celestia
